name: Cool Soda Can
description:
It's a lovely day in the forest and you are a cool soda can.

It's thirsty work being a forest animal, but lucky for all of them you're here to share delicious fizzy sodas with the parched patrons of the park.

Unlock all five delicious flavours of soda to experience all the soda distribution techniques currently known to science.

  • Get a high score!
  • Get a normal score!
  • Count the number of minutes you spend in the game!
  • Remove pesky plants!
  • Numbers go up?
